chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
M: Model

Goal:
forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)

Premises:
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, Formula L -> nat -> Term L -> Formula L
updateValue = fun (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (v : U M) (x : nat) => if Nat.eq_dec n x then v else value x : (nat -> U M) -> nat -> U M -> nat -> U M Arguments updateValue _%function_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : Term L -> Term L -> Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula L | impH : Formula L -> Formula L -> Formula L | notH : Formula L -> Formula L | forallH : nat -> Formula L -> Formula L Arguments forallH _ _%nat_scope
interpFormula = fix interpFormula (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | @equal _ t s => interpTerm value t = interpTerm value s | @atomic _ r ts => interpRels (arity L (inl r)) (rel M r) value ts | @impH _ A B => interpFormula value A -> interpFormula value B | @notH _ A => interpFormula value A -> False | @forallH _ v A => forall x : U M, interpFormula (updateValue value v x) A end : (nat -> U M) -> Formula L -> Prop Arguments interpFormula _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
value : forall A : Type, A -> option A
U = fun m : Model => let (U, _, _) := m in U : Model -> Set
interpTerm = fix interpTerm (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) {struct t} : U M := match t with | @var _ v => value v | @apply _ f ts => interpTerms (arity L (inr f)) (func M f) value ts end with interpTerms (m : nat) (f : naryFunc (U M) m) (value : nat -> U M) (ts : Terms L m) {struct ts} : U M := match ts in (Terms _ n) return (naryFunc (U M) n -> U M) with | @Tnil _ => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) 0 => f0 | @Tcons _ m0 t ts0 => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) (S m0) => interpTerms m0 (f0 (interpTerm value t)) value ts0 end f for interpTerm : (nat ->
subInterpFormula : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f < -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)
subInterpTerm : forall (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpTerm (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) t = interpTerm value (substituteTerm L t v s)
subInterpRel : forall (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (ts : Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : Term L) (r : naryRel (U M) n), interpRels n r (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) ts < -> interpRels n r value (substituteTerms L n ts v s)
subFormulaDepth : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), depth L (substituteFormula L f v s) = depth L f
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (notH L f) v s = notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
freeVarInterpFormula : forall (v1 v2 : nat -> U M) (g : Formula L), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula L g) -> v1 x = v2 x) -> interpFormula v1 g -> interpFormula v2 g
subFormulaExist : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else existH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s))
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then forallH L x f else forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s))
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteTerm L (apply L f ts) v s = apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
subFormulaIfThenElse : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 f3 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (ifThenElseH L f1 f2 f3) v s = ifThenElseH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s) (substituteFormula L f3 v s)

subFormulaAnd : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (andH L f1 f2) v s = andH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subFormulaOr : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (orH L f1 f2) v s = orH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (impH L f1 f2) v s = impH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)

FA1 : forall (L : Language) (A : Formula L) (v : nat) (t : Term L), Prf L nil (impH L (forallH L v A) (substituteFormula L A v t))
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (var L x) v s = var L x
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (a : Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (forallH L v a)) (r : nat * Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaForall L v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall L v a z2 q
substituteFormulaNotNice : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaNot L f z1 q = substituteFormulaNot L f z2 q
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (atomic L r ts) v s = atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (L : Language) (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaImp L f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp L f z2 g z4 q

Prf_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : Formulas L) (f0 : Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Set), (forall A : Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (impH L A B)), P Axm1 (impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : Formulas L) (f14 : Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p
Prf_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : Formulas L) (f0 : Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Type), (forall A : Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (impH L A B)), P Axm1 (impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : Formulas L) (f14 : Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p
Prf_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : Formulas L) (f0 : Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> SProp), (forall A : Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (impH L A B)), P Axm1 (impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : Formulas L) (f14 : Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p

```coq
intros value f v s H.
induction f.
- simpl in *. exact H.
- simpl in *. exact H.
- intros x Hx.
  apply IHf.
  intros y.
  destruct (Nat.eq_dec v x).
  + rewrite e. exact Hx.
  + apply H.
- intros H1 z.
  apply IHf; intros y Hy.
  apply H1; auto.
- intros x H1 z.
  destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v).
  + rewrite e. auto.
  + destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s)).
    * apply subInterpTerm.
    * auto.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros value f v s H. induction f. - simpl in *. apply H. - simpl in *. apply H. - intros x Hx. apply IHf. intros y. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v x). + rewrite e. apply Hx. + apply H. - intros H1 z. apply IHf; intros y Hy. apply H1; auto. - intros x H1 z. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v). + rewrite e. auto. + destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s)). * apply subInterpTerm. * auto.
